alert.note: Alert for Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:20PM CDT until June 06 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 119 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Chambers, or 13 miles south of O`neill, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knievels Corner and Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 163 and 173. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
